The #JulianJohnstonTeam is proud to officially welcome @montybeisel 👏🏻

Monty Beisel joins us with over a decade of industry experience within the Los Angeles luxury real estate community. As a former NFL player for the Kansas City Chiefs, New England Patriots and Arizona Cardinals, Monty has developed his impressive clientele list working alongside professional athletes, A-list celebrities and high-net-worth individuals representing distinguished properties throughout Southern California. Having played at the highest level in professional sports, including Super Bowl XLIII, Monty brings a unique perspective and extensive network to the Julian Johnston Team.

With expertise in luxury home and condo sales, investment property acquisitions and high-end residential development, Monty’s passion for architecture has led him to design, develop and manage multiple groundbreaking projects throughout his 12-year real estate career.

Backed by powerhouse brokerage Corcoran, the largest real estate network in the country and a renowned team, Monty continues his dedication to building long-term relationships and is committed to delivering the highest level of personalized service to his clients.

A graduate of Kansas State University with Bachelor of Arts in Marketing and Advertising, Monty is an entrepreneur by nature, owning and operating several of his own businesses. Having relocated to South Florida, Monty has shifted his focus to servicing the Miami – Fort Lauderdale real estate market where he permanently resides and calls home with his fiancé Marcela.

💥We invite you to the "ALL IN" Celebrity Charity Poker Event at Nobu Miami Beach on Saturday, March 11, 2023. This inaugural event will begin at 5:30pm with drinks and entertainment. Cards fly poker game will start at 7pm.♦️@silentvictimsofcrime

Special performance by celebrity world renowned mentalist, LIOR SUCHARD.

There will be live music 🎶, silent auction, handcrafted cocktails 🍹 and dining provided by Nobu. You can participate as a guest or poker player and win prizes. Past guests include famed players from Miami Heat, Dolphins, and notable business moguls.

This event is being held for a great cause. Silent Victims of Crime 501(c)(3) is a charity that was established 27 years ago. It supports the children of incarcerated parents/caregivers to help stop the cycle of incarceration and make for a better society. There are currently 160 children in the charity. Statistically, these children are 70% more likely than their peers to end up in prison like their parents.** SVC has a 97% success rate in keeping these children out of prison, improve their lives, and help them positively contribute to our communities.

To purchase tickets, please visit Allincharitypoker.org
♠️♥️♣️

Theme: “Yellowstone”- Western Chic

Cost:
$5,000 Poker Player Entry
$1,000 Guest Entry (Early Access Pricing)
Proceeds go to the Silent Victims of Crime (SVC)

Silent Victims of Crime 501(c)(3) is a charity that was established 27 years ago. It supports the children of incarcerated parents/caregivers to help stop the cycle of incarceration and make for a better society. There are currently 160 children in the charity. Statistically, these children are 70% more likely than their peers to end up in prison like their parents.** SVC has a 97% success rate in keeping these children out of prison, improve their lives, and help them positively contribute to our communities.

This Father’s Day... a salute to my father Kevin, a father of four children. And as I get older and have my own children, I recognize the sacrifices that a father makes to raise his children the best he can. As there are good times and bad times, you do the best you can and get on with life. My father's favorite saying that I have inherited is “it is what it is." I have always felt he meant there are some things you can’t control, so stay positive and keep moving forward. As always, there are more good times ahead, but cherish the time you have now with the people you love!!
